page.title: 20Latest news of Wroxall.
page.content:
We made a camp down the bank.We walked through stingers and stingers (nettles).It took a week to make.We got stung all over. ****************** On Saturday (7:9:85) a combine harvester caught fire.The man jumped out but he didn't hurt himself.Now it is all black. ****************** My Aunty had a baby girl,she weighed four pounds.When I held her the first time she was quiet.Then she screamed. ****************** Yesterday my cat was stuck up the tree.My Dad got her down.
************************************ * This record of Wroxall in 1985 * * was compiled by * * the children of Wroxall School. * ************************************
